import React from 'react' import{Card,CardBody} from 'reactstrap' import {Link} from 'react-router-dom' import './tour-card.css' const TourCard = ({tour}) => { const {id,title, city, price,photo} = tour const totalRating = reviews?.reduce((acc,item)=>acc+item.rating ,0) const avgRating = totalRating ===0 ? "" : totalRating ===1 ? totalRating : totalRating/reviews?.length return (
{featured &&Featured}
{city} 9 {avgRating ===0 ? null :avgRating} {totalRating===0 ? ('Not Rated'):(({reviews.length}))}
{title}
${price} /per/person
) } export default TourCard
